topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/547c0c9e636872638d4e0000#post_547c0c9e636872638d4e0000
[bq="Too_Offensive"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/547c0b466368720f0a790200#post_547c0b466368720f0a790200
I want to learn so I can visit japan for a nerdy shopping spree
How weeb am I?[/bq]
Just be forewarned that Japan is a socially conservative nation(well I know in the USA conservative means something different from in Europe, but I don't know what it's called in Europe).  Anyways the reason why I say this is that is that there have been cases of weaboos not knowing the laws in Japan and as a result getting arrested for stupid shit.
